newletter.title: If you are interested or just starting in programming, I have written these articles for you.

proyectNebula.description: Nebula Wear is a luxury apparel brand and e-commerce platform focused on creating a robust and scalable solution. I lead the technical team, guiding the development and applying our specialized skills in each area. My focus is to take this project to its full potential.
proyectNebula.myRole: My role: Technical leader and Front-End developer.

proyectAgiliza.description: Agiliza is a startup dedicated to the centralization and presentation of business data. I led the creation of the app, developing the interface that displays BI charts and managing authentication, user control and permissions.

proyectMoorishville.description: Moorishville is a county in the United States for which I have worked as a freelancer. My most notable project for them was the development of a system for searching files in a local database.
